name: 3 Pieces of soap, 3 ounces of bath salt, and a bath puff.
description: This 3 Pieces of soap, 3 ounces of bath salt, and a bath puff is the ideal gift for someone or just to treat your self right. You can get the bath salts and soaps in any desired fragrance. All of our products are eco-friendly and are non-allergenic. They can be used on anyone including babies.

name: 2 Piece citrus smelling Soaps
description: This 2 piece citrus smelling soap set comes in two citrus smelling fragrances, orange and grapefruit. This item renews you skin and makes you look better than you think. Our product are eco-friendly and are non-allergenic. Everyone even babies can use our products.

name: 3 Piece Dome Soap Set
description: This 3 piece dome soap set comes in any fragrance desired. Each piece of soap is 2.5 ounces. All our products are eco-friendly. After taking a shower/bath with our soap you body will be clean, moist, smelling good and also looking great.

name: 7 Piece Gift Basket
description: This 7 piece gift basket consists of 5 pieces of soaps (desired fragrance/s), a one ounce  bottle of bath salt(desired fragrance), and a four ounce bottle of body wash.

name: 35 Piece Sampler of our different Soap and Body Care Fragrances.
description: This item is 35 pieces of our different soap and body care fragrances. Each soap sampler bar is one ounce. We have 35 different fragrances. Here's your chance to get a refreshing shower that will leave your body clean, moist, and smelling great. Our products are eco-friendly. They are also non-alergenic. Anyone can use them, even babies.
